text:
Hey all,
is there any way to pull the `internal value` of a dropdown select? I have a custom object property where the labels are full names, while the internal values are unique slugs. The unique slugs are the values I need - not the labels that are returned by default.

I’m not sure I understand what you mean. Are you talking about module field select values or like, DOM selects? In a DOM select, you should have like `<option value="internal-name">Some Label Text</option>`

Apologies,
For example, I have a custom object, one of the properties in the object is called 'Instructors'

When I edit that property and view the drop down select options I see the labels, as well as the internal values.

When making the object call which includes the 'Instructors' property, the instructors property returns all of the labels from the property - but what I need are the internal values (not the labels)

in the screenshot attached for instance, the labels are what is returned in the object call by default, but I am looking for the internal values (circled in blue).
